acadmicProjects.name: ChatBox-Lisa
descriptions: An advanced chatbot developed using NLP techniques, the NLTK Python library, and the Django framework.
Demonstrates remarkable capabilities such as conducting Wikipedia searches, providing news updates, movie downloading links, and accurate weather information.

acadmicProjects.name: QuotesClub
descriptions: A dynamic writing website catering to writers and performers.
Provides a platform for creative expression with features for composing Shayari, poems, thoughts, opinions, and status updates.
Showcases compositions on images and wallpapers for enhanced visual appeal.

acadmicProjects.name: Junkbox
descriptions: A comprehensive movie downloading platform built on the Django framework.
Features an extensive collection of over 18,000 movies.
Utilizes web scraping techniques to extract movie data and corresponding downloading links from various sources, offering easy access and direct downloads.

projects.title: SENFORCE
descriptions: Product deal with capturing data of vehicle, generate alert in case of violation and sends data to cloud, created an API to automate the ticket generation to the offender.
Developed backend functionality using Java, Spring-Boot Hibernate ensuring seamless and efficient order processing.
Proactively identified and resolved critical issues, reducing application downtime by 30% and increasing overall customer satisfaction Handling product deployment and Bug fixing.
Assisted in the design and development of database structures to support application functionality

projects.title: SCANCAM
descriptions: Product designed for managing fuel station operations by gathering the vehicle data.
Designed the user interface and user experience for all the core features including forecourt view, drive-off etc.
Development of UI/UX features, working closely with cross-functional teams to meet the needs.
Conducted comprehensive security testing to identify and address vulnerabilities before deployment.

projects.title: SENPARK
descriptions: Parking solution to monitor parking occupancy in a parking area and efficiently manage parking.
Developed a user-friendly dashboard for drivers to check parking availability.
Identified & addressed critical issues in a proactive manner, contributed in the development of database structures.
